argument.description: Is an expression that contains the name of the file associated with the current database for which to return property information. file_name is nchar(128).
Is an expression that contains the name of the file property to return. property is varchar(128), and can be one of the following values.

description: Returns the specified file name property value when a file name in the current database and a property name are specified. Returns NULL for files that are not in the current database.
